forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers between 8pm and 10pm, then a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. South wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a high near 47. South wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for classic and skate ski today, March 2, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Red and Blue loops are hard packed and fast with a light skiff of new . There is some wind debris: but no more than minor agility training . LF 7

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Was skiing classical with waxless (fish scale) skis.  Tracks where in surprisingly good shape.  Tracks were set for the entire length of Buck's Run  including connector.  Quite a few skaters out---seemed like they were going a little slower than usual.    Many Kudos to the groomers!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 6 lifts, the Space Worm, and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Welcome to a beautiful ski day. The temperature is forecast to reach the mid-20's and sunshine is predicted in the afternoon. The snow surface is machine groomed and continues to be in good shape even after the freeze and thaw cycle. The HEAD-2-HEAD race is on JB Arena at 10 AM this morning. The knock-out bracket round begins at noon and will feature some thrilling dual paneled slalom racing that is great for spectators. No NASTAR racing today due to the HEAD-2-HEAD race. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
